text: José Vicente Rangel Vale (10 July 1929 - 18 December 2020) was a Venezuelan leftist politician. He ran for President three times in the 1970s and 1980s and later supported Hugo Chávez. Rangel served under Chávez as Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1999 to 2001, as Minister of Defense from 2001 to 2002, and as Vice President of Venezuela from 2002 to 2007."Venezuela gets civilian defence minister", BBC News, 2 February 2001."Venezuelan cabinet reshuffle", BBC News, 4 February 2001. Rangel died on 18 December 2020 in Caracas from cardiac arrest after having a long-illness at the age of 91.Falleció José Vicente Rangel, ex vicepresidente de Hugo Chávez ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Vice presidents of Venezuela Category:People from Caracas
title: José Vicente Rangel
